nodes.text: The MA-6 Frontline Droid was a type of battle droid used as security forces by the Selkath species on the planet Manaan during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Virtually identical to the MA-9 Frontline Droid, the MA-6 carried a blaster rifle in combat, and a number of them were part of the security forces of Genetics Laboratory G-1.

The MA-6 Frontline Droid appears a type of enemy in the Tactical Flashpoint "Depths of Manaan," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.9: Galactic Strongholds Early Access.
